argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrladdd.1 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mvrladdd.2 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | mvrladdd.3 | |- ( ph -> A = ( B + C ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_comraddd | |- ( ph -> A = ( C + B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) = ( ( C + B ) - B ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( C + B ) - B ) = C ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) = C ) |
